t:
After a heated argument, my girlfriend stormed out of the house.

In the dead of the night, the doorbell rang and I answered it.


Her severed head lay on the doormat with a note saying, “I will never treat you like that.”
c:
As I kicked the head and yelled, "Reveal yourself," I realized I had finally found someone as twisted as I am.

Sadly, they had gotten to my girlfriend before I could.



#girlfriend #fight #anger #murder #decapitated #night #insane #note
